definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: And the king of Babylon smote them, and put them to death in Riblah in the land of Hamath.
sentences.chinese: 巴比倫王就把他們擊殺在哈馬地的利比拉。

sentences.english: The people of Judah were taken captive to Babylon because of their unfaithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 猶大人因犯罪就被擄到巴比倫。

sentences.english: And Judah was carried away into exile to Babylon for their unfaithfulness .
sentences.chinese: 猶大人因犯罪就被擄到巴比倫。

sentences.english: Together they defeated the Babylonian army.
sentences.chinese: 他們一起擊敗了巴比倫軍隊。

sentences.english: Then the king promoted Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, in the province of Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 那時王在巴比倫省，高升了沙得拉，米煞，亞伯尼歌。

sentences.english: We would have healed Babylon, but she cannot be healed;
sentences.chinese: 你們要從巴比倫中逃奔，各救自己的性命。

sentences.english: The multi-language Babylon dictionary has been inserted on the translation pages at the bottom of the side menu.
sentences.chinese: 網頁底部的菜單已經裝入多語種巴比倫字典。

sentences.english: There is no mention of them in ancient Babylonian records.
sentences.chinese: 但在古巴比倫時期的記錄中，卻隻字未提。

sentences.english: And it seems there is still more to learn from the Babylonians.
sentences.chinese: 而且似乎還有更多的東西要向巴比倫人學習。

sentences.english: I notice that the moon is male here just as it is in Sumer and Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 我看到月亮是男性，在這裏就像是蘇美爾和巴比倫。

sentences.english: Nibiru was described as a star by the ancient Babylonian astronomers.
sentences.chinese: Nibiru被古代巴比倫天文學家描述成一顆恆星。

sentences.english: King Nebuchadnezzar appointed him as king and later deposed king Zedekiah to Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 尼布甲尼撒薩立他爲王，後又將希底家王貶至巴比倫。

sentences.english: It will be given into the hands of the king of Babylon, and he will destroy it with fire.
sentences.chinese: 這城必交在巴比倫王的手中，他必用火焚燒。

sentences.english: You still pray to the one true God, no matter how long you live in Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 不管你在巴比倫住了多久，你依舊向唯一的真神禱告。

sentences.english: This tradition dates back to the time of the Wall-mounted X-ray Unit (DX-802) .
sentences.chinese: 這一傳統要追溯到巴比倫人的那個年代。

sentences.english: Deliver thyself, O Zion, that dwellest with the daughter of Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 與巴比倫人同住的錫安民哪，應當逃脫。
